nodes.Description: You want to merge in your finished feature branch

Edges.OptionText: Merge your branch directly into development

nodes.Description: Git notifies you that there is a merge conflict in the pull request

Edges.OptionText: Fix the code, push the branch (pull req is automatically updated)
Fix conflicts then create a pull request
Fix conflicts merge branch into master
fix conflicts then merge your branch back into development

nodes.Description: You fix the conflicts and check the code works as expected, you merge back into development and all is good!
